text: Sara Pavlović (born 10 May 1996) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Serbia women's national team. ==Career== Pavlović has been capped for the Serbia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian women's footballers Category:Serbia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:ŽFK Spartak Subotica players
title: Sara Pavlović
